Tuwharetoa Parker ‘lost the plot’ after attacking a comatose man, driving with passerby on car https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tuwharetoa-parker-lost-the-plot-after-attacking-a-comatose-man-driven-with-passerby-on-car/ECHHXQRWSVHTXIKF55W4IQIBVQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tuwharetoa-parker-lost-the-plot-after-attacking-a-comatose-man-driven-with-passerby-on-car/ECHHXQRWSVHTXIKF55W4IQIBVQ/ Belinda Feek“Whatever the victim had done ...(there) was utterly no justification for your behaviour.” Wed, 04 Dec 2024 07:00:00 +0000 The intersection of Victoria and Collingwood Sts in central Hamilton where Tuwharetoa Parker viciously attacked a man in retaliation for smashing his passenger car window and punching his friend. Photo / Belinda Feek
